tool.name: ArchR Generate Arrow Files from TSV
tool.description: - generate ArchR Arrow files from scATAC-seq BAM files
tool.command: ln -s '$input' sample.tsv && bgzip -c sample.tsv > sample.tsv.gz && Rscript $__tool_directory__/ArchR_generateArrowFile.R --cores 2 --minTSS "$mintss" --minFrag "$minfrag" --maxFrag "$maxfrag" --outArrow "$output" -g "$genome" -s sample.tsv.gz -n "$samplename" 2>&1 && mv ArchRLogs/*.log "$log" && mv *.arrow "$output" && mv QualityControl/*/*pdf QualityControl/

param.name: mintss
param.label: Minimum TSS enrichment
param.help: The minimum numeric transcription start site (TSS) enrichment score required for a cell to pass filtering for use in downstream analyses. Cells with a TSS enrichment score greater than or equal to minTSS will be retained. TSS enrichment score is a measurement of signal-to-background in ATAC-seq.

param.name: minfrag
param.label: Minimum read depth per cell
param.help: The minimum number of mapped ATAC-seq fragments required per cell to pass filtering for use in downstream analyses. Cells containing greater than or equal to minFrags total fragments wll be retained.

param.name: maxfrag
param.label: Maximum read depth per cell
param.help: The maximum number of mapped ATAC-seq fragments required per cell to pass filtering for use in downstream analyses. Cells containing less than or equal to maxFrags total fragments wll be retained.

param.name: genome
param.label: Select reference Genome
param.help: Select reference genome used for enrichment annotation comparison.

tool.help:
**What it does**
Converts scATAC-seq data to ArrowFile format while generating basic QC plots Provided by: https://www.archrproject.com/index.html
